Test Name: MLH1 Hypermethylation and BRAF Mutation Analysis
Purpose: To detect MLH1 promoter hypermethylation and BRAF mutations in tumor samples to aid clinical decision-making and personalized therapy.
Container: FFPE tissue block or unstained FFPE slides
Equipment: Microtome, DNA extraction kit, Real-Time PCR system/thermal cycler, Sanger sequencer or RT-qPCR mutation detection platform
